name: Celeb Rush - Crazy Ride with a Celebrity and the Roller Coaster
name_original: Celeb Rush - Crazy Ride with a Celebrity and the Roller Coaster
description:
You will love it!

Get your hands on this crazy Roller Coaster! Scare celebrities to death but do not lose them. You need to deliver at least their heads to get more points.

"What a sick game" - Mela Tedal
"Crazy stuff, but I love it" - Kundelbury
"I had so much fun with it, I cannot stop playing" - Preston Holmes

Want more features? Let us know: skalamandra@gmail.com
